name: Azure AD Graph
description: Connects to Azure AD Graph REST API services

actions.description: Use supplied credentials to generate a token with MS Graph

actions.verbose: For more information on using the filter_string parameter, refer to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/azure/ad/graph/howto/azure-ad-graph-api-supported-queries-filters-and-paging-options.

filter_string.description: Filter string to apply to user listing

actions.description: Reset or set a user's password in an Azure AD environment

user_id.description: User ID to change password - can be user principal name or object ID

force_change.description: Force user to change password on next login

actions.description: Invalidate all active refresh tokens for a user in an Azure AD environment

user_id.description: User ID to disable tokens of - can be user principal name or object ID
User ID to enable tokens of - can be user principal name or object ID
User ID to change password - can be user principal name or object ID

actions.description: List attributes for all or a specified user

user_id.description: User ID - can be user principal name or object ID

example_values: Successfully retrieved attributes for user user@test.onmicrosoft.com
Status: Successfully retrieved attributes for user user@test.onmicrosoft.com, User enabled: False

actions.description: Set an attribute for a user

user_id.description: User ID - can be user principal name or object ID

actions.description: Remove a user from a specified group

user_id.description: User ID to remove from group

example_values: Status: Successfully removed user from group

actions.description: Add a user to the tenant by creating an organizational account

user_id.description: User ID to add to group

example_values: Status: Successfully added user to group

actions.description: List the members in a group
actions.verbose: Pagination is not implemented for this action as this endpoint does not support pagination. Here is the Documentation for the same.

actions.description: Returns true if a user is in a group; otherwise, false
List the directory roles in a tenant

example_values: Can read basic directory information. For granting access to applications, not intended for users.
